chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)

Premises:
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
Inductive N : Set := N0 : N | Npos : positive -> N For Npos: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
mpl_compat = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (p0 p1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some p0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some p1 -> pl_compat p0 p1 : state -> state -> Prop
Inductive positive : Set := xI : positive -> positive | xO : positive -> positive | xH : positive For xI: Argument scope is [positive_scope] For xO: Argument scope is [positive_scope]
state = Map prec_list : Set
mpl_compat_5 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list) (p : positive), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~0) pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list (N.pos p) pl)
mpl_compat_4 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 1%N pl) -> mpl_compat s1 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_3 : forall (s0 s1 : state) (pl : prec_list), mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M1 prec_list 0%N pl) -> mpl_compat s0 (M1 prec_list 0%N pl)
mpl_compat_2 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s1 s3
mpl_compat_1 : forall s0 s1 s2 s3 : state, mpl_compat (M2 prec_list s0 s1) (M2 prec_list s2 s3) -> mpl_compat s0 s2
dta_correct = fun d : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> Prop
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
prec_in_state = fun (s : state) (p : prec_list) => exists c : ad, MapGet prec_list s c = Some p : state -> prec_list -> Prop
borne_0_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map prec_list) (p : prec_list), (prec_in_state m0 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m0) -> (prec_in_state m1 p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 m1) -> prec_in_state (M2 prec_list m0 m1) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M2 prec_list m0 m1)
borne_0_1 : forall (a : ad) (p' p : prec_list), prec_in_state (M1 prec_list a p') p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M1 prec_list a p')
N_ind : forall P : N -> Prop, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
taille_0 = fix taille_0 (l : prec_list) : nat := match l with | prec_cons _ y z => S (taille_0 y + taille_0 z) | prec_empty => 0 end : prec_list -> nat
Ndouble_plus_one_inv_xI : forall (x : ad) (p : positive), N.succ_double x = N.pos p~1 -> x = N.pos p
Nneg_bit0_2 : forall (a a' : N) (p : positive), N.lxor a a' = N.pos p~1 -> N.odd a = negb (N.odd a')
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_rec : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Set), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
borne_1_1 : forall (a : ad) (s' s : state), state_in_dta (M1 state a s') s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M1 state a s')
mapcanon_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (y : A), P (M1 A a y)) -> (forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> P m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> P m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> P (M2 A m1 m2)) -> forall m : Map A, mapcanon A m -> P m
Pos.divide_xO_xI : forall p q r : positive, (p | q~0)%positive -> (p | r~1)%positive -> (p | q)%positive
MapDelta_semantics_1_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = None -> MapGet A m' a0 = None -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = None

MapDelta_semantics_2_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A) (m' : Map A) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a0 = None -> MapGet A m' a0 = Some y0 -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a y) m') a0 = Some y0
MapDelta_semantics_3_1 : forall (A : Type) (a0 : ad) (y0 : A) (m' : Map A) (a : ad) (y y' : A), MapGet A (M1 A a0 y0) a = Some y -> MapGet A m' a = Some y' -> MapGet A (MapDelta A (M1 A a0 y0) m') a = None
borne_1_2 : forall (m0 m1 : Map state) (s : state), (state_in_dta m0 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m0) -> (state_in_dta m1 s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille m1) -> state_in_dta (M2 state m0 m1) s -> taille_1 s <= DTA_taille (M2 state m0 m1)
in_dom_M1_2 : forall (A : Type) (a a0 : ad) (y : A), in_dom A a0 (M1 A a y) = true -> a = a0
M1_semantics_2 : forall (A : Type) (a a' : ad) (y : A), (a =? a')%N = false -> MapGet A (M1 A a y) a' = None
in_M1_id : forall (A : Set) (a : A) (x : ad) (e : A), (exists c : ad, MapGet A (M1 A x e) c = Some a) -> a = e
MapDisjoint_M1_r : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : B), MapDisjoint A B m (M1 B a y) -> in_dom A a m = false
MapDisjoint_M1_l : forall (A B : Type) (m : Map A) (a : ad) (y : B), MapDisjoint B A (M1 B a y) m -> in_dom A a m = false
Inductive mapcanon (A : Type) : Map A -> Prop := M0_canon : mapcanon A (M0 A) | M1_canon : forall (a : ad) (y : A), mapcanon A (M1 A a y) | M2_canon : forall m1 m2 : Map A, mapcanon A m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2) For mapcanon: Argument scopes are [type_scope _] For M0_canon: Argument scope is [type_scope] For M1_canon: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _] For M2_canon: Argument scopes are [type_scope _ _ _ _ _]
in_dom_M1_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A), in_dom A a (M1 A a y) = true
M1_semantics_1 : forall (A : Type) (a : ad) (y : A), MapGet A (M1 A a y) a = Some y
in_dom_M1 : forall (A : Type) (a a0 : ad) (y : A), in_dom A a0 (M1 A a y) = (a =? a0)%N
state_in_dta = fun (d : preDTA) (s : state) => exists a : ad, MapGet state d a = Some s : preDTA -> state -> Prop
Pos.mul_1_r : forall p : positive, (p * 1)%positive = p
aux_Neqb_1_0 : forall p : positive, (p =? p)%positive = true
M2_canon : forall (A : Type) (m1 m2 : Map A), mapcanon A m1 -> mapcanon A m2 -> 2 <= MapCard A (M2 A m1 m2) -> mapcanon A (M2 A m1 m2)

original: intros s0 s1 pl p H. apply mpl_compat_1 with (s0 := (M2 prec_list s0 s1)) (s2 := (M1 prec_list (N.pos p~1) pl)). auto. apply mpl_compat_5. auto.
